### Hotel information

Workshop will be hosted by [Svornost Hotel](https://www.hotelsvornost.cz/en/)

Address: Harrachov 496, 512 46 HARRACHOV, Česká Republika

#### Room options

- 1 participant in a single room
- 1 participant in a double room
- 1 participant in a double room with spouse/partner

You can reserve a room during registration.

::: {.callout-note}
Please note that all applicants must submit an abstract during registration. See the submission guidelines on the [__Program__](program.qmd) page.
:::

[Register](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSePVEOv-yAea85tZoad6R_ZIyz6kNtlMH6BTEAhUVycr0nzZg/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.1039419063=2026-04-22&entry.1717464771=2026-04-26){.btn .btn-lg .btn-danger role="button"}

### Payment

The workshop registration fee is __€50__ per participant, which is in addition to Svornost Hotel room reservation price.

You will receive the payment link (including conference fee and hotel room reservation) on the e-mail address that you used in the registration form.
